texts.Title: Title
texts.SameUrlAlreadyExist: Same url already exists if you want to add this post, you should change the url!
texts.EmailNotValid: Please enter a valid email address.
texts.CreatePostTitleInfo: Title of the post to be shown on the post list.
texts.CreatePostSummaryInfo: A short summary of the post to be shown on the post list. Maximum length: {0}
texts.CreatePostCoverInfo:
For creating an effective post, add a cover photo. Upload 16:9 aspect ratio pictures for the best view.
Maximum file size: 1MB.
texts.MilestoneErrorMessage: Could not get the current milestone details from Github.
texts.QuestionItemErrorMessage: Could not get the latest question details from Stackoverflow.
texts.CreatePostSuccessMessage: The Post has been successfully submitted. It will be published after a review from the site admin.
texts.ShareYourExperiencesWithTheABPFramework: Share your experiences with the ABP Framework!
texts.Author: Author
texts.BlogItemErrorMessage: Could not get the latest blog post details from ABP.
texts.CommunityPostRequestErrorMessage: Could not get the latest post request from Github.
texts.PostRequestFromGithubIssue: There aren't any post requests now.
texts.ArticleRequestsDescription: Want to see a specific content here? You can ask the community to create it!
texts.NewsletterEmailDefinition: Get information about happenings in ABP, such as new releases, free sources, posts, and more.
texts.CommunityPrivacyPolicyConfirmation: I agree to the Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy.
texts.PostRequestMessageTitle: Open an issue on GitHub to request a post/tutorial you want to see on this website.
texts.PostRequestMessageBody: Here's a list of the requested posts by the community. Do you want to write a requested post? Please click on the request and join the discussion.
texts.CreatePostLanguageInfo: The language for the post content.
texts.CreateGithubPostUrlInfo: Full URL of the Markdown file on GitHub (example).
texts.CreateVideoContentUrlInfo: Original Youtube URL of the post.
texts.CreateExternalPostUrlInfo: Original External Url of the post.
texts.ThankYouForContribution: Thank you for contributing to the ABP Community.
texts.GithubPostSubmitStepOne: 1. Write a post on any public GitHub repository with the Markdown format. example
texts.GithubPostSubmitStepTwo: 2. Submit your post URL using the form.
texts.GithubPostSubmitStepThree: 3. Your post will be rendered in this website.
texts.YoutubeVideoSubmitStepOne: 1. Publish your video on YouTube.
texts.YoutubeVideoSubmitStepTwo: 2. Submit the video URL using the form.
texts.YoutubeVideoSubmitStepThree: 3. Visitors will be able to watch your video content directly on this website.
texts.ExternalContentSubmitStepOne: 1. Create a content on any public platform (Medium, your own blog or anywhere you like).
texts.ExternalContentSubmitStepTwo: 2. Submit your content URL using the form.
texts.ExternalContentSubmitStepThree: 3. Visitors are redirected to the content on the original website.
texts.ChooseYourContentType: Please choose the way you want to add your content.
texts.PostContentViaGithub: I want to add my post with GitHub in accordance with the markdown rules.
texts.PostContentViaYoutube: I want to share my videos available on Youtube here.
texts.PostContentViaExternalSource: I want to add the content I published on another platform here.
texts.GitHubUserNameValidationMessage: Your Github username can not include whitespace, please make sure your Github username is correct.
texts.PersonalSiteUrlValidationMessage: Your personal site URL can not include whitespace, please make sure your personal site URL is correct.
texts.TwitterUserNameValidationMessage: Your Twitter username can not include whitespace, please make sure your Twitter username is correct.
texts.LinkedinUrlValidationMessage: Your Linkedin URL can not include whitespace, please make sure your Linkedin URL is correct.
texts.MinimumSearchContent: You must enter at least 3 characters!
texts.Volo.AbpIo.Domain:060001: Source URL("{PostUrl}") is not Github URL
texts.Volo.AbpIo.Domain:060002: Post Content is not available from Github("{PostUrl}") resource.
